title: He Has Two Wives And Two Separate Wives
itunes:title: He Has Two Wives And Two Separate Wives
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 22 years old and I recently graduated from college, so I’m quarantined at my parents’ house. They have been married for 37 years and the marriage has been rocky since I was a little girl, but they are still together. My father works out of the country for two months every year, so that gives my mother a break from him. In late March, I found out that my father was not only working while he was overseas, he had started a whole new life...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 22 years old and I recently graduated from college, so I’m quarantined at my parents’ house. They have been married for 37 years and the marriage has been rocky since I was a little girl, but they are still together. My father works out of the country for two months every year, so that gives my mother a break from him. In late March, I found out that my father was not only working while he was overseas, he had started a whole new life...............
